AdminInstructions: You control the game! Wait until everyone has joined.
ClickToStart: When everyone is ready, click below:
EndGameConfirm: Do you want to end the game and show the correct answers to everyone?
ExplainingText: The person above is the one you will buy a Christmas gift for. Below you can see what others think they have wished for. Go to the wishlist game to join in and guess!
GameRules:
How to play:

Here you can see everyone's wishes, your task is to guess who wished for what.

You cannot see your own wishes but you click on the banner and guess the member that best matches the wish.

When you have guesses for all wishes, click submit guesses and in the Leaderboard it will update how many you guessed correctly.

By clicking the button above you will return to the page where you see who your Secret Santa is and you will also see what others think your assigned person wishes for!
GuessInstructions: Guess who wished for what below!
Inspiration: What people think that your assigned person has wished for:
NeedAtLeastTwo: You need at least two members in the group to start the game!
NoInspiration: No one has guessed for this person yet...
PleaseEnterGroupCode: Please enter your name and the group code!
PleaseEnterGroupName: Please fill in name and group name!
ShareWith: Share this with the members who want to join!
StayOnPage: Stay on this page. It updates automatically.
WaitingForAdmin: Waiting for admin to start the game...
